title: CIA Denies Cheney Request to Declassify Memos

content: Oh the irony, they are refusing to release the memo`s by using a Executive Order Issued by bush As you are aware, a request for Mandatory Declassification Review is governed by Executive Order 12958, as amended, which was signed and executed by the President on March 25, 2003. Under section 3.5.(a)(3) of that Executive Order, a document is excluded from Mandatory Declassification Review if that document contains information that is the subject of pending litigation. This provision ensures that the Mandatory Declassification Review process is not used to disrupt simultaneous litigation proceedings that are already pending. In researching the information in question, we have discovered that it is currently the subject of pending FOIA litigation (Bloche v. Department of Defense, Amnesty International v. Central Intelligence Agency). Therefore, the requested document, which contains this information, is excluded from Mandatory Declassification Review. -- Savage
reply: Oh the irony, they are refusing to release the memo`s by using a Executive Order Issued by bush As you are aware, a request for Mandatory Declassification Review is governed by Executive Order 12958, as amended, which was signed and executed by the President on March 25, 2003. Under section 3.5.(a)(3) of that Executive Order, a document is excluded from Mandatory Declassification Review if that document contains information that is the subject of pending litigation. This provision ensures that the Mandatory Declassification Review process is not used to disrupt simultaneous litigation proceedings that are already pending. In researching the information in question, we have discovered that it is currently the subject of pending FOIA litigation (Bloche v. Department of Defense, Amnesty International v. Central Intelligence Agency). Therefore, the requested document, which contains this information, is excluded from Mandatory Declassification Review. -- Savage

content: Now isn't it strange how all of you play with twist of words..just so in your mind you are right, regardless if your wrong...Now that is what is known as a liberal/democrat/progessive. The CIA allowed the BAD info to be leak and shown, but not the other side of the coin. Thats just like a divorce, there is ALWAYS two sides to the story...Funny how the cover-up has started and right in front of your eyes. And you all will just turn a blind side to it, just have you had already done for so many years. It was Clinton and Kerry and Democrat PARTY, I REPEAT. I REPEAT IT WAS CLINTON AND KERRY AND DEMOCRAT PARTY THAT SAID ON MANY OCCASSION THAT IRAQ HAD WMD'S!!!!!!! How stupid can some people believe that Bush lied!!!!!!! If anyone lied it was Clinton, Kerry,and the Democrat party. Now ask yourself what Berger stole out of the classify libary for clinton!!!! What was so important to risk that?. One man came up to Bush after Bush made President and whipser in his ear that the Intell was wrong..one man I remind you out of how many democrats and Clinton and Kerry? Why did Kerry flip-flop on his vote? BECAUSE he knew the intell was wrong for he sat on the Intell committee for christ sake.. But...and I mean but..since ONE man told Bush the intell was not right, that makes him a liar, well what about a ex-President and his democrat party? what does that make them? Hero's for not telling Bush the TRUTH!!!! You people are something else...let me tell you, you have been bull crap all over and like it... Just think if Clinton, Kerry and democrat party would have spoken up and told the truth, we would not be in Iraq today...Think about that and all those lives lost...
